text: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَا مَا دَامَتِ ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتُ وَٱلۡأَرۡضُ إِلَّا مَا شَآءَ رَبُّكَۚ إِنَّ رَبَّكَ فَعَّالٞ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ

translation.en: [They will be] abiding therein as long as the heavens and the earth endure, except what your Lord should will. Indeed, your Lord is an effecter of what He intends
translation.id: (mereka kekal di dalamnya selama ada langit dan bumi,407) kecuali jika Tuhanmu menghendaki (yang lain). Sungguh, Tuhanmu Maha Pelaksana terhadap apa yang Dia kehendaki
